import React, { useState } from 'react' import BookMenu from './BookMenu' function Book({book,updateshelfInGrid}) { console.log("book : " + JSON.stringify(book)) const [bookCopy,setBook] = useState({...book}) const updateshelf = (shelf)=>{ bookCopy['shelf'] = shelf; alert("Book.js >> bookCopy >> " +JSON.stringify(bookCopy)) setBook(bookCopy) updateshelfInGrid(bookCopy) } return (
{/* */}
{book.title}
{book.authors.map((author)=>

{author}

)}
) } export default Book
